item.name: Check if the organization is eligible for international transfers

header.description: Required only for Sandbox API requests; to get one, please sign up to the [Developer Portal](https://developers.qonto.com/).

request.description:
OAuth scope: `organization.read`

Checks if the organization is eligible for international transfers.

<Info>
This endpoint is still in **beta**. Please get in touch with our team if you have any question or feedback: [here](https://getqonto.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portals).
</Info>

item.name: List requirements for an international beneficiary

header.description: Language to be used to display the requirements. Languages supported: en, it, es, de, fr, pt
Required only for Sandbox API requests; to get one, please sign up to the [Developer Portal](https://developers.qonto.com/).

request.description:
OAuth scope: `international_transfers.write`

Get the list of requirements needed to create or use an existing beneficiary for the given quote.

<Info>
This endpoint is still in **beta**. Please get in touch with our team if you have any question or feedback: [here](https://getqonto.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portals).
</Info>

response.name: Returns the list of requirements for the given beneficiary and quote.
